subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: A scrambled injury-time goal by William Gallas gave Arsenal a 2-2 draw yesterday with visiting Manchester United, preserving its unbeaten record and keeping it on top of the Premier League. Arsenal leads with 27 points from 11 matches; United is second with 27 from 12 games.
